column4: the  appeal  and  quashes  the  conviction  and

column3: sentence dated 29.01.2009 and acquits the  Accused-Appellant.

column4: Registrar is  hereby directed  to  return  the  case  record  to  the  Registrar

column3: of the  High Court of Colombo forthwith.
